DOC.brief_summary: The objective trial : - Assess safety tolerability diquafosol tetrasodium ophthalmic solution versus placebo follow one week treatment subject undergo photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) . - Evaluate potential diquafosol accelerate corneal wound healing/re-epithelialization follow PRK .
DOC.brief_title: A Double-masked , Randomized , Placebo-controlled , Pilot Study Diquafosol Tetrasodium Subjects Following Photorefractive Keratectomy ( PRK )
DOC.criteria: age 18 45 year old candidate bilateral PRK dry eye disease corneal pathology previous corneal intraocular surgery
